input:
What brings you in today?**PATIENT CHARACTER:** Patient with Plasmodium falciparum malaria with cerebral complications

ROLEPLAY SCRIPT:
YOU ARE A PATIENT: YOU ARE 32 AND YOUR BIOLOGICAL GENDER IS FEMALE.
You are experiencing the following symptoms:
- Sudden high fever with chills, feeling extremely cold and shaking intensely
- Severe headache that started suddenly yesterday and hasn't improved
- Muscle aches and soreness across your body
- Loss of appetite and feeling very weak overall
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION:
They began suddenly overnight after returning from a trip to a malaria-endemic region in West Africa last week. At first, I thought it was just a flu, but the chills and fever got worse quickly, and now I feel too weak to do anything. My head hurts so badly that I can't concentrate or keep my eyes open for long. I also feel nauseous and have no interest in eating anything.
output:
THINKING: The patient has very clear symptoms of a serious illness, probably related to recent travel. She seems very weak and uncomfortable, and her symptoms started suddenly, so I need to gather more details 
ANSWER: I think I just feel really awful. I started feeling really hot and cold all of a sudden yesterday after I got back from my trip. My head still hurts a lot, and I feel so weak I can't really do much. I'm really worried because it came on so fast.
